title: A Tale of Autumn
overview: Magali, forty-something, is a winemaker and a widow: she loves her work but feels lonely. Her friends Rosine  and Isabelle both want secretly to find a husband for Magali.
synopsis: Magali, forty-something, is a winemaker and a widow: she loves her work but feels lonely. Her friends Rosine  and Isabelle both want secretly to find a husband for Magali.
